Class Missile

java.lang.Object
Missile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sprite
public class Missile extends Object implements Sprite
Contains functions for the logic, behavior, and graphical representation of missiles.

      public Missile(double startX, double startY, Sprite shooter)
      Initializes Missie variable
      Parameters:
      startX - Double value that indicates the horizontal starting position
      startY - Double value that indicates the vertical starting position
      shooter - Sprite that the missile belongs to

      Parameters:
      xIncrement - Double value representing the number of pixels that the missile will move side to side

      public void setDirection(double xDirection, double yDirection)
      Sets the direction of a missile
      Parameters:
      xDirection - Double value that tells the missile if it is travelling right or left
      yDirection - Double value that tells the missile if it is travelling up or down
